item.title: Make your github profile README self updated
item.description: TL;DR, introducing a way to update your github profile readme automatically using golang and github action.

item.title: Build a personal blog using sveltekit
item.description: At the beginning, I wanted to use litjs to build this website, however, after diving into it for a while, I found it way easier to use a more complete frontend framework, sveltekit, and knew better about what have those modern tool done...

item.title: Reviving a 8-year-old MBP 2015 with Lubuntu
item.description: A collection of tools' references that I would use in setting up a linux computer.
